Prev

Node Version Manager (NVM)

Next
  • nvm, a magic bash script for managing node environments
  • https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm
  • Installs using curl or wget piped to bash
Command What it does
nvm --version outputs the version of nvm
nvm install 20 Install version 20 of Node.js
nvm ls List available node versions (not just installed)
npm use 20 Use a specific node version
